title: EGRET
info: Content management, search, and delivery system built primarily off MarkLogic.
Implemented several levels of identity and institutional access management systems, including a SAML service provider.
Architected delivery and management components, worked with external firm for  design of the delivery component.
Refined deployment process for content updates so that new content updates (as well as new server deployments) required minimal developer effort.
Links below are two products served using two different deployments of the same code.

title: RILM Informational Website
info: Spearheaded conversion of old, entirely custom PHP site to WordPress to make development easier and reduce developer hours spent on content updates.
Built off wireframes and design prototypes built by an external design firm.
Built prototypes for making internal content publicly searchable via WordPress to facilitate SEO.

title: RIPM Jazz Periodicals
info: Brought in to expedite launch of a delivery interface.
Implemented external design, optimized and modernized old client code and build systems.
Provided security, budget, and development advice for planning the future of this and other similar digitization projects.

title: Fordham IP Institute
info: Maintained, modernized, and cleaned up existing WordPress website.
Worked to minimize developer expenses by making website more easily editable by administrative staff.
Advised and assisted with implementation and use of external event management systems.
